dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think government price controls are just red tape, but actually, Kazakhstan is seeing real drug price drops from a simplified model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think government price controls are just red tape, but actually, Kazakhstan is seeing real drug price drops from a simplified model.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to changes in the pricing model, drug costs are expected to decrease both for the public under state programs and on wholesale and retail markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Deputy Minister Yerzhan Nurlybayev announced they've removed all those extra markups—like, uh, marketing and customs fees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Deputy Minister Yerzhan Nurlybayev announced they've removed all those extra markups-like, uh, marketing and customs fees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was announced by Deputy Minister of Healthcare Yerzhan Nurlybayev. According to the official, marketing, transportation, customs, and other surcharges have been excluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and now it's just the one markup on the manufacturer's factory price. That's a huge shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and now it's just the one markup on the manufacturer's factory price. That's a huge shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, the only markup is on the manufacturer's price.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And they're aiming to have all medicines recalculated by July 1st, which is pretty soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And they're aiming to have all medicines recalculated by July first, which is pretty soon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Considering that this model has already been tested, all medicines registered in Kazakhstan will be recalculated by July 1," he noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he mentioned they expect a 19 percent drop for medicines under state health programs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he mentioned they expect a nineteen percent drop for medicines under state health programs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "We anticipate a price reduction of around 19 percent for medicines under the guaranteed volume of free medical care and mandatory social health insurance, and about 30 percent in wholesale and retail segments," said Yerzhan Nurlybayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is significant, but even more so for wholesale and retail, where it could be around 30 percent cheaper.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is significant, but even more so for wholesale and retail, where it could be around thirty percent cheaper.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "We anticipate a price reduction of around 19 percent for medicines under the guaranteed volume of free medical care and mandatory social health insurance, and about 30 percent in wholesale and retail segments," said Yerzhan Nurlybayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's massive for affordability. I mean, removing those unjustified surcharges clearly adds up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's massive for affordability. I mean, removing those unjustified surcharges clearly adds up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A number of markups on the maximum price, which we considered unjustified, have been removed," Nurlybayev stated at a press briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it sounds like they've already tested this model, so it's not just theoretical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And it sounds like they've already tested this model, so it's not just theoretical.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Considering that this model has already been tested, all medicines registered in Kazakhstan will be recalculated by July 1," he noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, active collaboration with the pharmaceutical community is underway, which, you know, probably helps smooth the transition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, active collaboration with the pharmaceutical community is underway, which, you know, probably helps smooth the transition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deputy minister added that active collaboration with the pharmaceutical community is currently underway to test the new model.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's one thing to announce changes, but working with manufacturers is key for actual implementation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's one thing to announce changes, but working with manufacturers is key for actual implementation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And this could set a precedent, right? Other countries might look at Kazakhstan's approach if it works.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this could set a precedent, right? Other countries might look at Kazakhstan's approach if it works.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Simplifying the pricing structure to just one transparent markup—that's a model others might follow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Simplifying the pricing structure to just one transparent markup-that's a model others might follow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Let's hope it delivers the savings without hurting availability. Fingers crossed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's hope it delivers the savings without hurting availability. Fingers crossed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's always the balance, but so far it sounds promising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's always the balance, but so far it sounds promising.
